article.class: theme-article entry-content post-4699 page type-page status-publish

div.class: owl-carousel carousel-slider arrows-outside arrows-visible-hover dots-hidden dots-center dots-square

div.h2: Utopian Academy for the Arts has expanded its offerings
to serve both elementary and middle school students.
Our scholars thrive in an environment that is focused on leadership,

h3.span: Join us for our new Virtual Open House sessions each Wednesday in April at 6 p.m.
Sessions will be held on April, 8, 15, 22, and 29

p.span: Through a structured and supportive environment, Utopian Academy for the Arts (UAFA) will develop the academic and artistic talents of students, and prepare them to enter and succeed in the global society with proficiency to enroll in the college, university, or specialty school of their choice. UAFA shall be a community school; nurturing academic excellence for all students and demonstrating leadership in character development. The vision statement is intended to serve as both the blueprint for improvement and the benchmark by which we will evaluate our progress.
